text: my daughter is rehtaeh Parsons and
rehtaeh ended her life last April she
did this following months of cyber
harassment cyber bullying for boys
we're all bragging about having sex with
her and that day she was throwing up on
a window and leaning out the window and
and they were having sex with her one of
them had taken a photograph with the
cellphone and they decided to spread it
and they started texting it to everybody
and it just went through her whole
school just like a fire bomb I think
that's one of the things that she never
actually was able to get over so I have
something here and this is the outfit
that she wore home from the hospital
that's how small she was she was pretty
tiny but I kept everything I was keeping
all this so that one day I would be able
to give it to her no I guess I have no
one to give it to you now to say that
what I'm facing is hard I don't think
it's even close to what Mateo went
through I remember that day like it was
yesterday the tattoo was her way to
reclaim a part of herself say this is my
body everything reminds me of her I sit
here on the couch with her some nights
and I watch her she'd get messages on
her phone said literally this guy's
saying that I have tattoos I must be a
[ __ ] I'm angry that these kids went and
did this to her and not one of them has

makes me very angry I'm angry that they
set up a Facebook page mocking her death
since forte is death I've spoken with
the Prime Minister of Canada I was
broken with our Justice Minister of

miserably failing our young girls and
